<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A sum type over pointer-like types.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This is a normal tagged union across pointer-like types that uses the low</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// bits of the pointers to store the tag.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Each member of the sum type is specified by passing a \\c</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// PointerSumTypeMember specialization in the variadic member argument list.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This allows the user to control the particular tag value associated with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a particular type, use the same type for multiple different tags, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// customize the pointer-like traits used for a particular member. Note that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// these &#42;must&#42; be specializations of \\c PointerSumTypeMember, no other type</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// will suffice, even if it provides a compatible interface.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This type implements all of the comparison operators and even hash table</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// support by comparing the underlying storage of the pointer values. It</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// doesn&#39;t support delegating to particular members for comparisons.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// It also default constructs to a zero tag with a null pointer, whatever that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// would be. This means that the zero value for the tag type is significant</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and may be desirable to set to a state that is particularly desirable to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// default construct.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Having a supported zero-valued tag also enables getting the address of a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// pointer stored with that tag provided it is stored in its natural bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// representation. This works because in the case of a zero-valued tag, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// pointer&#39;s value is directly stored into this object and we can expose the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// address of that internal storage. This is especially useful when building an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;ArrayRef&#96; of a single pointer stored in a sum type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// There is no support for constructing or accessing with a dynamic tag as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that would fundamentally violate the type safety provided by the sum type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointersumtype"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TagT, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight">... MemberTs&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointersumtype/#af6a210a37ff26be591528765bbf55d98">PointerSumType</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">HelperT = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper">detail::PointerSumTypeHelper</a>&lt;TagT, MemberTs...&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We keep both the raw value and the min tag value&#39;s pointer in a union. When</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the minimum tag value is zero, this allows code below to cleanly expose the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// address of the zero-tag pointer instead of just the zero-tag pointer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// itself. This is especially useful when building &#96;ArrayRef&#96;s out of a single</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pointer. However, we have to carefully access the union due to the active</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// member potentially changing. When we &#42;store&#42; a new value, we directly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// access the union to allow us to store using the obvious types. However,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when we &#42;read&#42; a value, we copy the underlying storage out to avoid relying</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on one member or the other being active.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">union </span><span class="doxyHighlight">StorageT &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ensure we get a null default constructed value. We don&#39;t use a member</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// initializer because some compilers seem to not implement those correctly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for a union.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">    StorageT() : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a>(0) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HelperT::template <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86floatingpoint-cpp/#ac28513e2e067144d291d2d8f0301b61a">Lookup&lt;HelperT::MinTag&gt;::PointerT</a> &#42;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Store the initial value of the pointer when read out of our storage.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InitialPtr = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointersumtype/#ad93a065314b96efa75a7a9f7be6d7519">get&lt;HelperT::MinTag&gt;</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now update the active member of the union to be the actual pointer-typed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// member so that accessing it indirectly through the returned address is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// valid.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Storage.MinTagPointer = InitialPtr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Finally, validate that this was a no-op as expected by reading it back</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// out using the same underlying-storage read as above.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(InitialPtr == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointersumtype/#ad93a065314b96efa75a7a9f7be6d7519">get&lt;HelperT::MinTag&gt;</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Switching to typed storage changed the pointer returned!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now we can correctly return an address to typed storage.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Storage.MinTagPointer;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointersumtype/#ac9e4632ffcbba5320e94b99f03e90c74"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uintptr&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointersumtype/#ac9e4632ffcbba5320e94b99f03e90c74">getOpaqueValue</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Read the underlying storage of the union, regardless of the active</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// member.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aab3863f16cb0767af49f0dd63bc5aa90">bit&#95;cast&lt;uintptr&#95;t&gt;</a>(Storage);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">protected</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointersumtype/#af8d3f8f1f8cf1016d54a023abab2e82c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointersumtype/#af8d3f8f1f8cf1016d54a023abab2e82c">getVoidPtr</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointersumtype/#ac9e4632ffcbba5320e94b99f03e90c74">getOpaqueValue</a>() &amp; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/#a0e0483d5325b9266682ff5e1dcd706faa9a36102b39902f39ba2d7c86e851a285">HelperT::PointerMask</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/detail">detail</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A helper template for implementing \\c PointerSumType. It provides fast</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// compile-time lookup of the member from a particular tag value, along with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// useful constants and compile time checking infrastructure..</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TagT, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight">... MemberTs&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper">PointerSumTypeHelper</a> : MemberTs... &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First we use a trick to allow quickly looking up information about</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a particular member of the sum type. This works because we arranged to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// have this type derive from all of the member type templates. We can select</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the matching member for a tag using type deduction during overload</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// resolution.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;TagT N, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Po</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">erT, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TraitsT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointersumtypemember">PointerSumTypeMember&lt;N, PointerT, TraitsT&gt;</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/#ac6790710c23f2e09fbbd366c5b365214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/#ac6790710c23f2e09fbbd366c5b365214">LookupOverload</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointersumtypemember">PointerSumTypeMember&lt;N, PointerT, TraitsT&gt;</a> &#42;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/#a133877d447fe8c73d27941db1ee1623d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;TagT N&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/#a133877d447fe8c73d27941db1ee1623d">LookupOverload</a>(...);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/lookup"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;TagT N&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/lookup">Lookup</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute a particular member type by resolving the lookup helper overload.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/lookup/#a697bd470c937311f04be94c891ef9c58"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/lookup/#a697bd470c937311f04be94c891ef9c58">MemberT</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">decltype</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/#ac6790710c23f2e09fbbd366c5b365214">LookupOverload&lt;N&gt;</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper">PointerSumTypeHelper</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The Nth member&#39;s pointer type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/lookup/#a242d15402f9f4b955a3ac8dd68f4843f"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/lookup/#a242d15402f9f4b955a3ac8dd68f4843f">PointerT</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MemberT::PointerT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The Nth member&#39;s traits type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/lookup/#a7f39b18e5874a27870e7e219fe82b309"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/lookup/#a7f39b18e5874a27870e7e219fe82b309">TraitsT</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MemberT::TraitsT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Next we need to compute the number of bits available for the discriminant</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by taking the min of the bits available for each member. Much of this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// would be amazingly easier with good constexpr support.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;uintptr&#95;t V, uintptr&#95;t... Vs&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/min"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/min">Min</a> : std::integral&#95;constant&lt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   uintptr&#95;t, (V &lt; Min&lt;Vs...&gt;::value ? V : Min&lt;Vs...&gt;::value)&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  template &lt;uintptr&#95;t V&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/min-ff3da524b068dd032e566ea1883afaf8"><span class="doxyHighlight">  struct Min&lt;V&gt; : std::integral&#95;constant&lt;uintptr&#95;t, V&gt; &#123;&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/#a78a6088ac065fefc180e7594f25c6552a89ff096aead3839255013f1e6c785902"><span class="doxyHighlight">  enum &#123; NumTagBits = Min&lt;MemberTs::TraitsT::NumLowBitsAvailable...&gt;::value &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Also compute the smallest discriminant and various masks for convenience.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/#a4092e609a5f36c3dc8a0b548c5b901db"><span class="doxyHighlight">  constexpr static TagT MinTag =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">      static&#95;cast&lt;TagT&gt;(Min&lt;MemberTs::Tag...&gt;::value);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  enum : uint64&#95;t &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/#a0e0483d5325b9266682ff5e1dcd706faa9a36102b39902f39ba2d7c86e851a285"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PointerMask = static&#95;cast&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;(-1) &lt;&lt; NumTagBits,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/#a0e0483d5325b9266682ff5e1dcd706faac8ea40f18be819ba919f824292a6fbb6"><span class="doxyHighlight">    TagMask = ~PointerMask</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Finally we need a recursive template to do static checks of each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// member.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">  template &lt;typename MemberT, typename... InnerMemberTs&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/checker"><span class="doxyHighlight">  struct Checker : Checker&lt;InnerMemberTs...&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">    static&#95;assert(MemberT::Tag &lt; (1 &lt;&lt; NumTagBits),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  &quot;This discriminant value requires too many bits!&quot;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/pointersumtypehelper/checker-89dc7cf8486976adbffc61e7fa407ff9"><span class="doxyHighlight">  template &lt;typename MemberT&gt; struct Checker&lt;MemberT&gt; : std::true&#95;type &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">    static&#95;assert(MemberT::Tag &lt; (1 &lt;&lt; NumTagBits),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  &quot;This discriminant value requires too many bits!&quot;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  static&#95;assert(Checker&lt;MemberTs...&gt;::value,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">                &quot;Each member must pass the checker.&quot;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end namespace detail</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Teach DenseMap how to use PointerSumTypes as keys.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">template &lt;typename TagT, typename... MemberTs&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/densemapinfo-a17385aa8d3c6043ea3a40efa42f76e0"><span class="doxyHighlight">struct DenseMapInfo&lt;PointerSumType&lt;TagT, MemberTs...&gt;&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/densemapinfo-a17385aa8d3c6043ea3a40efa42f76e0/#a45f2e54865e30dac4e5c976f153e9caf"><span class="doxyHighlight">  using SumType = PointerSumType&lt;TagT, MemberTs...&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/densemapinfo-a17385aa8d3c6043ea3a40efa42f76e0/#a3898ae2649a29d07beeb13395a4f777d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  using HelperT = detail::PointerSumTypeHelper&lt;TagT, MemberTs...&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/densemapinfo-a17385aa8d3c6043ea3a40efa42f76e0/#a2e559b32bb82bfc6cbd774a8a01de564ae1eb97d537c88c59b97c1205afc3aeaa"><span class="doxyHighlight">  enum &#123; SomeTag = HelperT::MinTag &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/densemapinfo-a17385aa8d3c6043ea3a40efa42f76e0/#a3cbde75268a55c21dd76dbdfc4913a4a"><span class="doxyHighlight">  using SomePointerT =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">      typename HelperT::template Lookup&lt;HelperT::MinTag&gt;::PointerT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/densemapinfo-a17385aa8d3c6043ea3a40efa42f76e0/#a1c58480934f83dda238bed7d94529f75"><span class="doxyHighlight">  using SomePointerInfo = DenseMapInfo&lt;SomePointerT&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/densemapinfo-a17385aa8d3c6043ea3a40efa42f76e0/#aec8d3c0127e930bfbd91a72b21b64fe0"><span class="doxyHighlight">  static inline SumType getEmptyKey() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">    return SumType::template create&lt;SomeTag&gt;(SomePointerInfo::getEmptyKey());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/densemapinfo-a17385aa8d3c6043ea3a40efa42f76e0/#ac1fbc50c8a3c811baae5ecae0d92e53b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  static inline SumType getTombstoneKey() &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">        SomePointerInfo::getTombstoneKey());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/densemapinfo-a17385aa8d3c6043ea3a40efa42f76e0/#a8106a0eb3b572678545580f8da010808"><span class="doxyHighlight">  static unsigned getHashValue(const SumType &amp;Arg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uintptr&#95;t OpaqueValue = Arg.getOpaqueValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">    return DenseMapInfo&lt;uintptr&#95;t&gt;::getHashValue(OpaqueValue);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/densemapinfo-a17385aa8d3c6043ea3a40efa42f76e0/#a4741a80a2c73a8239bb218e4efa9827c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  static bool isEqual(const SumType &amp;LHS, const SumType &amp;RHS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">    return LHS == RHS;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
